week_1.task: Drink at least 8-10 glasses of water per day to boost metabolism and suppress appetite
Replace one unhealthy snack with a healthy one, such as fruits or nuts, to reduce calorie intake
Take a 30-minute walk or do some light exercise, such as yoga or stretching, to increase physical activity

week_2.task: Reduce your daily caloric intake by 250-500 calories by eating smaller portions or skipping one meal
Incorporate strength training exercises, such as squats, lunges, or push-ups, to build muscle mass and boost metabolism
Get at least 7-8 hours of sleep per night to help regulate hunger hormones and support weight loss
